issues.title: Climate Change and Environmental Protection
issues.description: Supports balanced approach to environmental policy, acknowledges climate change, advocates for responsible resource development in Alaska

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Moderate stance on healthcare, opposed complete repeal of Affordable Care Act, supports protections for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Indigenous Rights and Native Alaskan Support
issues.description: Strong advocate for Native Alaskan communities, supports tribal sovereignty and economic development programs

issues.title: Energy Policy
issues.description: Supports all-of-the-above energy strategy, including renewable and traditional energy sources, critical of excessive environmental regulations

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, pathway to citizenship, border security, and balanced approach to immigration policy

issues.title: Federal Budget and Fiscal Policy
issues.description: Advocates for responsible spending, supports balanced budget amendments, opposes excessive government spending

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased funding for rural and remote education, STEM programs, and vocational training
